name: Ronald MASON, Petitioner v. SUPERIOR COURT OF PENNSYLVANIA, Respondent

parties: Ronald MASON, Petitioner v. SUPERIOR COURT OF PENNSYLVANIA, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 6th day of July, 2012, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and/or Extraordinary Relief is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
47 A.3d 1176
Ronald MASON, Petitioner v. SUPERIOR COURT OF PENNSYLVANIA, Respondent.
No. 68 EM 2012.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 6, 2012.
